Check the total number of the arguments

Print the usage syntax if there is no input

Definition at line 40 of file imsex.cpp.

                                {
        int opt;
        char *catname = NULL;
        char *imagename = NULL;
        char *checkname = NULL;
        char *weightname = NULL;

        Sextractor* sex;

        struct option longopts[] = {
                 {"image" ,1, NULL, 'i'},
                 {"check",1, NULL, 'c'},
                 {"catalog",1, NULL, 'd'},
                 {"weight",1, NULL, 'w'},
                 {"help", 0, NULL, 'h'},
                 {0,0,0,0}};

        while((opt = getopt_long(argc, argv, "i:c:d:w:h",
           longopts, NULL))  != -1){
              switch(opt) {
                 case 'i':
                       imagename = optarg;
                       break;
                 case 'c':
                       checkname = optarg;
                       break;
                 case 'd':
                       catname = optarg;
                       break;
                 case 'w':
                       weightname = optarg;
                       break;
                 case 'h':
                       printUsageSyntax(argv[0]);
                       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
                       break;
                 case '?':
                       printUsageSyntax(argv[0]);
                       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
                       break;
              }
        }


        if (argc < 2 ) {
                printUsageSyntax(argv[0]);
                exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
        }

        sex = new Sextractor(imagename);



        delete(sex);
        return EXIT_SUCCESS;
}
